options.title: Evolve with your consciousness, one breath at a time
options.subheadline: Come home to yourself by beginning your inner journey with the best of ancient wisdom and modern science

options.title: Reclaim your story, redesign your life
options.subheadline: Come home to yourself by beginning your healing journey with the best of ancient wisdom and modern science

options.title: Shaping inner quests
options.subheadline: With a fair mix of spirituality and science, I help individuals reclaim their lives and step into their own healing

scroll.headline: Hi, I'm Mayuri,
scroll.info: Growing up in India, a land steeped in spirituality, I’ve always been drawn to understanding the intricacies of the human mind and emotions. This fascination found focus when I encountered a transformative breathing and meditation program by Art of Living during my engineering days.

scroll4.headline2: Start Your Journey to Inner Peace
scroll4.bodyCopy: Feeling overwhelmed by modern life? Our programs, inspired by ancient wisdom, offer a modern path to inner calm & self-discovery through breathwork & meditation.Join us and embark on a journey of self discovery.

scroll5.headline: Live a life of intention
scroll5.bodyCopy: Alan Cohen said, “When the intention is clear, so is the way.” This newsletter is a nudge to live an intentional life and to show up for yourself with compassion. Make it a monthly practice to feed your inner life with the best in spirituality, growth, and healing.

scroll6.headline: A Space for Growth, Support, and Transformation
scroll6.cardBody1: Join a legion of kindred souls who open their hearts and minds, sharing personal stories of healing, self-growth, and transformation.
scroll6.cardBody2: Immerse yourself in a robust community, where regular check-ins nurture growth. Expect encouragement, accountability, and motivation as we embark on this journey together.

point1.head: Inquisitive Beginnings
point1.body: Born and raised in India, the land of spiritual wonders, I've always been a curious soul, eager to unravel the mysteries of spirituality, emotions, and the human mind.

point2.head: Breath of Transformation
point2.body: My journey took a pivotal turn during my engineering days when I stumbled upon a life-altering breathing and meditation program offered by the Art of Living. Drawing guidance and inspiration from the footsteps of my master, little did I know that this moment would set the course for a lifelong exploration.

point3.head: Becoming a Guide
point3.body: In 2008, I ventured into a new chapter as a meditation and breathwork teacher. Over the years, I've had the privilege of sharing these transformative practices with diverse communities, from corporate settings to university campuses and serene meditation centers

point4.head: A Tech-Infused Twist
point4.body: Adding a unique twist to my journey, I pursued a Bachelor of Engineering in Information Technology, blending the spiritual with the technological. Working in a corporate world as well for almost two decades, I have a first hand experience of the challenges we all through on a daily basis

point5.head: Hidden Passions
point5.body: Beyond the well-known facets, there are some secrets not many are aware of. I'm not just a meditation enthusiast; I'm also deeply immersed in the world of Ayurveda and hold formal training in Vedic astrology. These pursuits have provided profound insights into the patterns of human behavior and the influence of celestial forces on our lives.

scroll1.1stToggle: Bachelors of Engineering in Information Technology.
scroll1.2ndToggle: Conducted 200+ Mind & Meditation workshops in leading corporates & universities
scroll1.3rdToggle: Partner at the learning platform, Inner Cord
scroll1.4thTogggle: Always planning a trip in my free time

cardBody.line1: Empowering individuals worldwide to embark on a journey of inner peace and self-discovery through the integration of ancient wisdom and modern science.
cardBody.line2: To create a harmonious world where every individual is equipped with the tools and knowledge to cultivate holistic well-being, rooted in the principles of curiosity, scientific inquiry, spiritual wisdom, and conscious living.

journey.head: Inquisitive Beginnings
journey.body: Born and raised in India, the land of spiritual wonders, I've always been a curious soul, eager to unravel the mysteries of spirituality, emotions, and the human mind.

journey.head: Breath of Transformation
journey.body: My journey took a pivotal turn during my engineering days when I stumbled upon a life-altering breathing and meditation program offered by the Art of Living. Drawing guidance and inspiration from the footsteps of my master, little did I know that this moment would set the course for a lifelong exploration.

journey.head: Becoming a Guide
journey.body: In 2008, I ventured into a new chapter as a meditation and breathwork teacher. Over the years, I've had the privilege of sharing these transformative practices with diverse communities, from corporate settings to university campuses and serene meditation centers

journey.head: A Tech-Infused Twist
journey.body: Adding a unique twist to my journey, I pursued a Bachelor of Engineering in Information Technology, blending the spiritual with the technological. Working in a corporate world as well for almost two decades, I have a first hand experience of the challenges we all through on a daily basis

journey.head: Hidden Passions
journey.body: Beyond the well-known facets, there are some secrets not many are aware of. I'm not just a meditation enthusiast; I'm also deeply immersed in the world of Ayurveda and hold formal training in Vedic astrology. These pursuits have provided profound insights into the patterns of human behavior and the influence of celestial forces on our lives.

scroll2.heading: Embarking on the journey of self-discovery, I've discovered guiding principles that serve as my compass, leading me toward my true north.
scroll2.subBody1: It all began with curiosity—an insatiable hunger to delve beneath the surface and explore the depths of spirituality.
scroll2.subHeading2: Passion for Science: Unveiling the Mind
scroll2.subBody2: Driven by a fervent passion for science, I immersed myself in the study of emotions and the human mind, transforming psychology from a mere interest into a profound soul-calling.
scroll2.subBody3: Ayurveda isn't just about plants and medicines; it's the essence of life itself. As an Ayurveda enthusiast, I've embraced a plant-based lifestyle that nurtures holistic well-being.
scroll2.subBody4: Delving into Vedic astrology has unveiled the ancient science of stars, revealing the profound influence of cosmic energy on our lives—a force akin to gravity.
scroll2.subHeading5: The Art of Breathing: Anchoring Presence
scroll2.subBody5: Simple yet profound, the practice of conscious breathing has been a steadfast anchor in my life, allowing me to align with the divine flow of existence.
scroll2.subBody6: Early dedication to meditation illuminated my path, guiding me toward my passion and purpose. Each session has sculpted the essence of who I am today.

scroll3.heading: Glimpses of the journey to self-discovery
scroll3.subHeading: Community CTA under the photos to be mentioned

programsPage.bodyCopy: An antidote to modern-day stressors, these programs invite you to centre yourself with holistic healing practices inspired from ancient Indian wisdom.

scroll2.headline: Live a life of intention
scroll2.bodyCopy: Alan Cohen said, “When the intention is clear, so is the way.” This newsletter is a nudge to live an intentional life and to show up for yourself with compassion. Make it a monthly practice to feed your inner life with the best in spirituality, growth, and healing.

scroll2.subHeadline: This program covers all base of holistic wellbeing and lays the foundation to form healthy habits that can become the bedrock of your days and your life
